errorMessages.loadFailed: Failed to load AI team members
errorMessages.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

errorMessages.deleteFailed: Failed to delete application, please try again

ConfirmDeleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
ConfirmDeleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {itemName}? This action cannot be undone.

description.add: Add a new application to the AI team. Please fill in the basic information.

ChatDialog.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm {name}, how can I help you?
ChatDialog.welcomeWithoutTools: {welcomeMessage} (Unable to configure tool service, only providing basic conversation)

warnings.toolServiceUnavailable: Unable to configure tool service, will use basic conversation mode

errors.processingError: Conversation processing error, please try again later

description.edit: Modify the details of this AI team member.
description.add: Provide the necessary information to create a new AI team member.

placeholders.name: Enter member name (max 50 characters)
placeholders.category: Enter tags, separated by commas (e.g.: Requirements Analysis,Test Cases)
placeholders.greeting: Member's greeting when conversation starts (max 200 characters)

skillsPlaceholders.role: Describe the member's role in detail, e.g.: "You are a senior test engineer"
skillsPlaceholders.responsibilities: Describe the member's specific responsibilities, capabilities and behavioral requirements, which will affect their performance in conversations.

modelConfig.title: Large Language Model Configuration
modelConfig.description: Set up the large language model used by the AI team member, click "Save" when done
modelConfig.temperatureHint: Lower values make responses more deterministic

notice.title: Note
notice.description: API keys are stored encrypted and only decrypted when needed for requests.

errors.decryptFailed: Unable to decrypt API Key, please re-enter

notice.title: Tip
notice.description: The current system only supports connecting to and using tools from the FIRST server in the `mcpServers` object in the JSON configuration.

errors.invalidJsonStructure: Invalid JSON structure, top level must contain a "mcpServers" object
errors.invalidServerConfig: Server "{name}" configuration is invalid: only Streamable HTTP configurations with 'url' field are supported, 'command' or 'args' are not allowed.

MessageList.noMessages: No messages yet. Start a conversation!
